Package org.cvs.application.api

Class QualificationTypeController

java.lang.Object
org.cvs.application.api.QualificationTypeController
@Controller
@RequestMapping(path="/qualifications/types")
public class QualificationTypeController
extends java.lang.Object

  • Constructor Details

    • QualificationTypeController

      public QualificationTypeController()

  • Method Details

    • addNewApplicationQualificationType

      @PostMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public QualificationType addNewApplicationQualificationType​(@RequestBody QualificationType qualificationType)
      Adds a new qualification types candidate via POST through URL: /qualifications/types.

      Example payload: { "name": "Bachelors Degree" }

      Parameters:
      qualificationType - the qualification type (can be a JSON payload) to be added to the system.
      Returns:
      the newly added qualification type

    • getQualificationType

      @GetMapping(path="/active/{qualificationTypeId}") @ResponseBody public QualificationType getQualificationType​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long qualificationTypeId)
      Fetches an active qualificationType via GET through URL: /qualification/types/active/{qualificationTypeId}.

      Example URL: /qualification/types/active/{qualificationTypeId}

      Parameters:
      qualificationTypeId - the qualificationType ID as a request parameter to be used in the query
      Returns:
      an active qualificationType if found

    • deleteQualificationType

      @DeleteMapping(path="/{qualificationTypeId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String deleteQualificationType​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long qualificationTypeId)
      Deletes a qualification type via DELETE method through URL: /qualifications/types/{qualificationTypeId}.

      Example URL: /qualification/types/1

      Parameters:
      qualificationTypeId - the ID of the qualification type (can be a JSON payload) to be deleted from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Deleted'

    • retireQualificationType

      @PostMapping(path="/retire/{qualificationTypeId}") @ResponseBody public java.lang.String retireQualificationType​(@PathVariable java.lang.Long qualificationTypeId)
      Retires an qualification type via POST through URL: /qualifications/types/retire/{qualificationTypeId}.

      Example payload: /qualification/types/retire/{qualificationTypeId}

      Parameters:
      qualificationTypeId - the ID of the qualification type to be retired from the system.
      Returns:
      a string that says 'Retired'

    • getAllQualificationTypes

      @GetMapping(path="") @ResponseBody public java.lang.Iterable<QualificationType> getAllQualificationTypes()
      Fetches all active qualification types via GET through URL: /qualifications.
      Returns:
      a list of all active qualification types in JSON or XML depending on client preferences
